subject: Fwd: Thanks for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to give a loan for a low month payment
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TODAY):
$246,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
